Package com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.grhscompsci2.java2DGame.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Astronaut, Bullet
    public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the base class for anything that needs to move/act on the screen. You should write classes that extend the actor class to make your game work. The player class, enemy classes, bullet classes, and obstacle classes should all extend the Actor class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Actor()
      Constructor that will set the image to the fileName, and set the position to (0,0).
      Actor​(java.lang.String fileName, int x, int y)
      Constructor that will set the image to the fileName and the position to the provided coordinates.
      Actor​(java.lang.String fileName, int x, int y, int speed)
      Constructor that will set the image to the fileName and the position to the provided coordinates, and set the speed of the actor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actor

        public Actor()
        Constructor that will set the image to the fileName, and set the position to (0,0). This correspnds to the center of the sprite.

      • Actor

        public Actor​(java.lang.String fileName,
             int x,
             int y)
        Constructor that will set the image to the fileName and the position to the provided coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the relative location of the file ("images/filename.png")
        x - the x coordinate of the center of the sprite
        y - the y coordinate of the center of the sprite

      • Actor

        public Actor​(java.lang.String fileName,
             int x,
             int y,
             int speed)
        Constructor that will set the image to the fileName and the position to the provided coordinates, and set the speed of the actor.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the relative location of the file ("images/filename.png")
        x - the x coordinate of the sprite
        y - the y coordinate of the sprite
        speed - the speed of the sprite, in scaled pixels

      • draw

        public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                 java.awt.image.ImageObserver i)
        Draws the sprite centered at the x, y location. Adapts to scale of the JFrame.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics2D object to draw the image
        i - the JPanel where the sprite will be drawn

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        This method is called when a key is pressed. The dx and dy attributes are modified based on what keys are pressed
        Parameters:
        e - the KeyEvent passed in from the KeyAdapter

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        This method is called when a key is released
        Parameters:
        e - the KeyEvent generated by the KeyAdapter

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Returns the bounds of the sprite. Used for collision dectection.
        Returns:
        a rectangle in the position and size of the sprite
